title: Ellie Reeves – 2022 Comments on Fracking Vote
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ellie Reeves, the Labour MP for Lewisham West and Penge, on Twitter on 19 October 2022.
content:
She [Liz Truss] walked past me in the chamber as I was on my way to the voting lobby with a big grin on her face whilst her MPs were literally in tears. You could not make this stuff up. General Election now.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
